remarks: If the value of a function which is the result of an operation defined by the maps-to notation is not empty, the operands and the argument of the function must be sets.  (Contributed by AV, 16-May-2019.)
statement:
ovmpt3rab1.o $e |- O = ( x e. _V , y e. _V |-> ( z e. M |-> { a e. N | ph } ) ) $.
ovmpt3rab1.m $e |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> M = K ) $.
ovmpt3rab1.n $e |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> N = L ) $.
ovmpt3rabdm $p |- ( ( ( X e. V /\ Y e. W /\ K e. U ) /\ L e. T ) -> dom ( X O Y ) = K ) $.

$d L a x y z $.
